abstract: An action that starts an in-app purchase.
overview:
## Discussion

Read this environment value to get an `PurchaseAction` instance for a given [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Environment]. Call the instance to start an in-app purchase. You call the instance directly because it defines a `PurchaseAction/callAsFunction(_:options:)` method that Swift calls when you call the instance.

For example, you can start an in-app purchase when the user taps a button:
